name: 吳傳威
objective: To study the various stresses and strains of elastic isotropic materials.
schedule:
1st	Preparation
2nd	Introduction
3rd	Axial stress & strain
4th	Axial stress & strain
5th	Shear stress & strain
6th	Torsion
7th	Shear & moment diagrams.
8th	Shear & moment diagrams
9th	Midterm exam.
10th	Flexural stress
11th	Flexural stress
12th	Transverse shear stress
13th	Transverse shear stress
14th	Compound stresses
15th	Principal stresses
16th	Deflection
17th	Stability conception
18th	Final exam.
scorePolicy:
1. Midterm exam.	25%
2. Quiz (twice)	15%
3. Homework	15%
4. Class attendant	10%
5. Final exam.	35%
